title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Repurposing an object in your wardrobe, home, or office could be the most effective solution to your current dilemma. Disposable items can be reused to save precious resources and live again in beautiful and vibrant ways. Perhaps fabric from a favorite dress finds a second life as a pillow cover, or an end table makes for a better extension to your desk. Whatever you decide to reinvent is only limited by your own creativity and need. Be slow to throw anything away that can be put to good use or bring joy to someone else.
